response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. Given its high value and unique features, it's worth more than $10,000 to me. Considering its significance to you, I propose a fair price of $12,000. This offer allows us both to benefit from the transaction. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you have any other suggestions. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
